subject: New York City Marathon
Marathon Running
lead_paragraph: By the time defending champion Jelena Prokopcuka reached the finish line of the New York City Marathon on Sunday, she was blowing kisses to the crowd, and a star-studded field was nowhere near her.
snippet: By the time defending champion Jelena Prokopcuka reached the finish line of the New York City Marathon on Sunday, she was blowing kisses to the crowd, and a star-studded field was nowhere near her.
